title: Status Effects
content: Charmed A Charmed creature can't harm the charmer, and the charmer has advantage on Charisma checks against the creature. Chest Trauma Has Disadvantage on Constitution Saving Throws and has one fewer action. Removed by healing. Chilled Affected entity is Vulnerable to Cold damage and Resistant to Fire damage.
